overview:
Tony is a native of Atlanta, GA and received his undergraduate degree in History from Georgia State University in 1990. He spent 12 years with United Parcel Service (UPS) rising to the position of Delivery Information Manager for the Georgia District. After leaving UPS, Tony has spent the last 16 years working in the AEC industry in various capacities from managing the daily business and accounting operations of Civil Engineering and BIM Services firms to managing production teams on three continents. Over the last five years he served as the Director of Sales & Marketing Operations for RCMS Group/ARC BIM Services Group, an Atlanta based BIM Services firm.

Currently, Tony is a Managing Advisor with AMPIRIX where he is responsible for Sales & Marketing in addition to new advisor recruitment. Through his various positions, Tony has developed an extensive knowledge of Business and Accounting Operations as well as Sales and Marketing Operations.
